title: The one that got away.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Feelsbadman :(

Gotta love Azir's pose tho xD
**"AFTER HERRRR!"**

replies.body: Show us the replay! would love to see how it all unfolded. If it was in a recent game you can get a highlight pretty easily

Sure haha, its not very ceremonious, it's more bad focus on their behalf than good playing on mine xD 
I just liked the pose Azir and his soldiers did just as she got away :P

Question: How does one share replays? 
Ive never been the most web-savvy :P
upload to youtube/facebook or another video hosting website and share the link =D

Oh nvm, i thought you meant there was a way to share the highlight to the boards directly from the client. MB!

Here it is as a video:
https://vimeo.com/213020206

Azir is busted. His poke is cancerous to verse in laning phase. The only way to beat him is to hard engage and his ult counters that?

Nice job, Riot.
